name: workout-cool
description: workout-cool is a self-hosted workout planner and tracker focused on simplicity. Users can define routines, record sessions, and review history via an accessible web UI suitable on desktop and mobile.
features: Routine builder: Create workout routines with exercises, sets, reps, and rest periods for structured training.
Session logging: Record completed workouts with actual weights, reps, and notes for each exercise.
Exercise database: Access a library of common exercises with instructions and muscle group targeting.
Progress charts: Visualize strength gains and workout frequency over time with simple graphs.
Workout history: Browse past sessions to review what you did and track consistency.
Rest timer: Built-in countdown timer to manage rest intervals between sets during workouts.
Mobile optimized: Use the app on smartphones during gym sessions with a touch-friendly interface.
Quick start: Begin workouts quickly by selecting from saved routines or recent sessions.
Personal records: Track your best lifts for each exercise to measure strength improvements.
Workout notes: Add comments to sessions for context about how you felt or modifications made.
Data export: Export workout history to CSV or JSON for backup or analysis in other tools.
Offline capable: Log workouts without internet connectivity and sync when connection is restored.
